awards:
第38届奥斯卡金像奖(1966)
　　最佳真人短片(提名) 诺埃尔·布莱克 / 马歇尔·拜克拉尔

　　第19届戛纳电影节(1966)
　　主竞赛单元 短片金棕榈奖 诺埃尔·布莱克
　　技术大奖 诺埃尔·布莱克

writer.name: 诺埃尔·布莱克 Noel Black

director.name: 诺埃尔·布莱克 Noel Black

introduction: The rare and wonderful surf instrumental soundtrack by Davie Allan and the Arrows is enough to make this "comming of age" short an important piece of Southern California history. This is a must see for Sixties music video fans and collectors of obscure surf music.The rare and wonderful surf instrumental soundtrack by Davie Allan and the Arrows is enough to make this "comming of age" short an important piece of Southern California history.
